2. API¶

2.1. Batch Processing¶

batch([base_dir, search_ext, dir_level])

Parent class for batch processing hyperspectral image data

defaults

Class containing all defaults for writing an ENVI datacube to file.

hsio([fname_in, name_long, name_plot, ...])

Class for reading and writing hyperspectral data files and accessing, interpreting, and modifying its associated metadata.

segment(spyfile)

Class for aiding in the segmentation/masking of image data to include pixels that are of most interest.

spatial_mod(spyfile[, gdf])

Class for manipulating data within the spatial domain (e.g., cropping by geographical boundary)

spec_mod(spyfile)

Class for manipulating data within the spectral domain (usually pixel-based)

2.2. Segementation¶

defaults

Class containing all defaults for writing an ENVI datacube to file.

hstools(spyfile)

Basic tools for manipulating Spyfiles and accessing their metadata.

segment(spyfile)

Class for aiding in the segmentation/masking of image data to include pixels that are of most interest.

2.3. Spatial Modifications¶

Polygon([shell, holes])

A two-dimensional figure bounded by a linear ring

defaults

Class containing all defaults for writing an ENVI datacube to file.

hstools(spyfile)

Basic tools for manipulating Spyfiles and accessing their metadata.

spatial_mod(spyfile[, gdf])

Class for manipulating data within the spatial domain (e.g., cropping by geographical boundary)

2.4. Spectral Modifications¶

hstools(spyfile)

Basic tools for manipulating Spyfiles and accessing their metadata.

spec_mod(spyfile)

Class for manipulating data within the spectral domain (usually pixel-based)

2.5. Utilities¶

defaults

Class containing all defaults for writing an ENVI datacube to file.

hsio([fname_in, name_long, name_plot, ...])

Class for reading and writing hyperspectral data files and accessing, interpreting, and modifying its associated metadata.

hstools(spyfile)

Basic tools for manipulating Spyfiles and accessing their metadata.
